txt.en: You have discovered a peculiar man who appears to be riding an avanc. You should speak with him.

'Greetings! I am Rook, a Wizard of Dunland.

'While I would not normally stoop to asking for aid, it seems my avanc has grown tired on our journey eastward to learn of more magics from the Easterlings.

'If you would help me, I would be happy to reward you with the finest of treasures. By the way, stranger, you look familiar... have we met?'
You have come across a most peculiar sight - a strange man appears to be riding an avanc eastward.
A strange man sits atop an avanc in the distance - you should speak to him, for surely he is an interesting fellow.
The stranger is located in western Sutcrofts along the shore by the Entwade.
